value:
$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Heroes, heed my call. Your power is
needed to quell the Tempest and
save this world.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|Of course! We can't allow the world
to be swallowed by chaos.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_WinterFes17,Face|We'll do whatever we can to preserve
the peace.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_WinterFes17,Face|Ha...ha-ha...bwa-ha-ha!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_WinterFes17,Face|Lissa! What's so funny?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|This is no laughing matter. Do you not
realize how dire this situation is?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_WinterFes17,Face|Oh, come on! How am I supposed to
take your little speeches seriously
when you're wearing those outfits?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_WinterFes17,Face|You know why we're dressed like this.
You were celebrating the winter
festival with us!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_WinterFes17,Face|It was my chance to get some time
alone with... with...$k$pThis stupid Tempest! I'll curse it a
thousand times...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|No matter how we're attired, we fight
to protect Ylisse! Move out!$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Your brave deeds have broken
through and quieted the chaos. You
all have my thanks.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|I'm just glad we could help. Maybe we
were dressed a little oddly...but what
matters is what we achieve together.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Don't say that. You look good. That
outfit suits you!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|You...think so? Well...I'll take the
compliment! Maybe I should wear it
more often...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_WinterFes17,Face|Um... I'm not sure how to put this,
but...you should think twice before
you trust Marth's taste in clothing.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_WinterFes17,Face|Well, well. I never expected to hear
such a thing from the legendary
Hero-King...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Had I been able, I would have loved
to have been with my family, dressed
like that...$k$pWhere I come from...we didn't often
have the chance to celebrate festivals
as you do.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|Marth...$k$pWhy don't you join us? The festival
isn't over just yet. Spend some time
with us!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I thank you for the kind offer, Chrom.
Unfortunately, I must be going... But
if the opportunity comes again...$k$pI will surely join you, courageous
Heroes!$k$p
